column3: > Could update license year in test/functional/rpc_getblockstats.py.\n\nPlease, let's not start nitting about copyright years. In as far as they matter at all (we don't know!) updating these once per year is enough.
Could reverse the loop and break on first optional?
nit, could early return with `if (num_args > m_args.size()) return false;`.
nit, could change condition to `n > num_args`?
I think this is the wrong place to overoptimize
